ValidationRule.description: Lender must determine if they plan to Underwrite a loan prior to moving to Credit Underwriting
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.No_Validation__c = False, NOT(ISPICKVAL(ffin_Lender_Plans_to_Underwrite__c, "Yes")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(ffin_Lender_Plans_to_Underwrite__c, "No")), ISCHANGED(LLC_BI__Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Credit Underwriting"), LLC_BI__Is_Main__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'Lender Plans to Underwrite?' must be determined prior to moving to Credit Underwriting
